Database¶

ER Diagram¶

Tables¶

Chromosome¶

1
2
3
4
5
6
CREATE TABLE chromosome (
  chromosome_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  chromosome_name VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  chromosome_species INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES species (species_id),
  unique (chromosome_name, chromosome_species)
  );
